channel.title: Portals that require items to use, help plz?
channel.description: hey i am trying to add a cool boss zone to my server and i want to make portals that require an item droped by previous boss to use. Any idea how to do this?if so any help would be greatly appreciated. thx to those who help me :)

item.title: Portals that require items to use, help plz?
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

ok ty for the help:)but is there any way to make it so that the item disappears after using the portal?

nevermind i found out, thanks i vain i for your help on making portal:)

Read full topic

item.title: Portals that require items to use, help plz?
item.dc:creator: @server868 server868
item.description:
@server868 wrote:

You could make it so you type in a command that requires you to have the item id. Such as a specific key. The command would do this:

  1. Teleport you to next boss
  2. Delete key from inv.
    3.Require you to have the key.

That seems like a simple way to me. IDK the exact coding ofr it tho. Dosent seem too hard.

Read full topic
